name: Rainbow Dash
description:
------ The Best Game for every ages! ------

Over 1 000 000 social players in 15 countries!

Tap and delete same color stones. Tap faster to activate super mode - Rainbow!

The best choice for match 3 gems, three in row or bubble puzzles game lovers.

------ Features: ------
- Funny gameplay -
- Great music -
- Colorful Graphic -

------ Free to download! ------
